property.name: campaignPrologue
property.value: "You fell asleep for a while rocked by the sea. Then, a gentle hit awakens you: the ship hits the dock of a castle harbor."

property.name: shopProducts
property.value: [ "potion","melee","ranged","armor"]

property.name: onTalk
property.value: "Oh. Someone came to save us! Please forgive my selfishness. I'm Paulitico, this castle humble librarian. We don't have much time... can you follow me to central square on the west, please?"

property.name: onTalk
property.value: "Our King gifted its best politician with the Guardian Stone, in order to wisely rule our lands. But, well... Something went wrong..."

property.name: onTalk
property.value: "After inviting the leaders of all the guilds, he trapped us all inside the castle and skeletons started appearing, killing many of us. We have to escape and I've a plan."

property.name: onTalk
property.value: "First we've to open the west wing of the castle. There should be a switch on the western dock on south. I'm not a fighter... can you go there for me?"

property.name: onTalked
property.value: "The dock is on south west. Good luck, traveller!"

property.name: onTalk
property.value: "You did it! Your heart is as strong as your heart, traveller. Now you've to find the western library. There is a book lying on the ground: that's a magic switch! Just read the first page and come back here."

property.name: onTalked
property.value: "Find the book lying on the ground and read it!"

property.name: onTalk
property.value: "Humans used to live isolated but, due to the lack of a particular skill or resource, they started fighting each other. After years of blood, they organized themselves in small groups..."

property.name: onTalk
property.value: "I've read that book thousands of times. Being selfish drives only toward destruction, isn't it? Let's move on. There is another library and book on the east wing. Do the same thing you did before, please."

property.name: onTalked
property.value: "Find the book lying on the ground and read it!"

property.name: onTalk
property.value: "Humans used to live in small villages but, due to their thirst for richness, they started fighting each other. After years of blood, they organized themselves in larger villages..."

property.name: onTalk
property.value: "Why this door is still closed? Looks like that the magic lock isn't working properly here. Are we destined to die here...?"

property.name: onTalk
property.value: "The doors of the northen gates has been swapped as requested. Nobody noticed us. Our experiment is precious, we won't commit the same error again."

property.name: onDefeated
property.value: "Aaaghh! I just wanted food! Food! Food! Gime me food! I'm dying! Aaaarghh!"

property.name: onTalk
property.value: "Ugh... Food? You brought me food? Are you food? Food? Food? Foood?"

property.name: onTalk
property.value: "This... This door needs the third book. You... you can find it into a jail on the west side. But... Why there are all these trees sorrounding the door? What... Why?"

property.name: onTalked
property.value: "Why... the trees?"

property.name: onTalk
property.value: "Humans used to live in cities but, due to their thirst for power, they started fighting each other. After years of blood, they organized themselves in nations..."

property.name: onTalk
property.value: "Traveller! The door is still stuck... I truly don't know what's happening here. Anyway I've heard a loud crash coming from the south east of the castle... and... well... a terribly scary roar. What... what was that?"

property.name: onTalk
property.value: "Are you going to free meee? Thaaank yoou... Please, come nearbye... Breeeak my chaiins..."

property.name: onDefeated
property.value: "You... you die... like me die... I'm experiment... Failed experiment... but... But you good experiment? Arggh..."

property.name: onTalk
property.value: "Here. There is... our politician. We've to... persuade him to open the castle gates. The door switch is stuck... Can you have a look over there?"

property.name: onTalked
property.value: "The switch, my traveller friend."

property.name: onSwitchPressed
property.value: "Paulitico: Sage! We are going to give a new form to the whole world... destroy every form of society and replace with our... Sage?! No, Sage, No! Aaaagh! *crackle*"

property.name: onTalk
property.value: "Trees... and destruction... interesting reaction, indeed. Follow me, the last door is over there."

property.name: onTalk
property.value: "I am the guardian golem, the defender of the humans, the eraser of every mistake they made. Why? Why you want to fight justice?"

property.name: onDefeated
property.value: "Humanity... is so violent... We guardians... have to keep them from killing eachother... To kill violence. But my time is up... now... It's your turn."

property.name: onTalk
property.value: "Thanks to the Gods! We've seen your little ship docked and came here. We gladly found again Brother Salivello... And I think we've to thank you again. You are our savior, traveller."

property.name: onTalk
property.value: "I was on my ship with the monk here... we were looking for our missing leaders and, luckly, we've found them thanks to you. Your ship is ready to leave. Where are you going to go this time?"

property.name: campaignEpilogue
property.value: "Golems. And more golems. The smell of their blood is becoming awkwardly familiar and pleasant to you. With the grateful voices of your friends echoing in the ears, you leave once more. Waiting for the next adventure..."

property.name: npcName
property.value: "Golem experiments"

property.name: onTalk
property.value: "Studies so far proven that people entrusted with the Guardian Stones gains unlimited power. Despite that, they are still mortal. It's an interesting contraddiction we can use as advantage."

property.name: npcName
property.value: "Golem experiments"

property.name: onTalk
property.value: "The Guardian Stone reacts with the dead owner body, turning him into a giant golem. He loses his memories but his previous sense of justice remains intact. Is this a viable way of manipulating them?"

property.name: npcName
property.value: "Golem experiments"

property.name: onTalk
property.value: "Guardian Stones are hard to replicate but every time a golem is spawned, another Guardian Stone appears nearby. Our pact with travellers played a key role on retrieving them."

property.name: npcName
property.value: "Golem experiments"

property.name: onTalk
property.value: "We don't know from where the Guardian Stone came from. The depictions of them we've found in this ancient sanctuary suggests that these stones were used by Gods for controlling the will of leaders, guardians and heroes."

property.name: onTalk
property.value: "His body is cold and lifeless."

property.name: campaignName
property.value: "Natural Enemy"

property.name: campaignPrologue
property.value: "After few days of sailing, you catch sight of a greenish island at the horizon. Food and water are running out, so you decide to stop and resupply."

property.name: shopProducts
property.value: [ "potion","melee","ranged","armor"]

property.name: onTalk
property.value: "East: Old town - North: Royal castle - West: Meadow"

property.name: npcName
property.value: "Elven guard"

property.name: onTalk
property.value: "A human woman came here not long ago. She says that she's the Traveller Guild chief. Honestly, I don't care - unless she pay me for guarding her shop."

property.name: onTalk
property.value: "Welcome traveller. The Elven Lands became very dangerous so be careful."

property.name: onTalk
property.value: "You must be the human that saved the dwaves from skeletons. Your reputation precedes you. I need your help. My daughter Castilla went on the north two days ago and isn't back. Bring her to me, please!"

property.name: onTalked
property.value: "Please, find my daughter."

property.name: onTalk
property.value: "The skeleton invaded our lands... Have we angered the Gods?"

property.name: onTalk
property.value: "North: Castle woods"

property.name: onTalk
property.value: "Fantastic. My father sent someone to rescue me. Why he doesn't mind his own business? So who will climb the castle walls? Very well. I'll go back to the goddamn town."

property.name: onTalk
property.value: "Castilla, you've finally made your mind and came back to me. I... I was so worried. Please, don't try to get into the castle anymore, It's too dangerous... Don't do anything reckless and let me handle the question."

property.name: onTalked
property.value: "Please, understand my beloved Castilla..."

property.name: onTalk
property.value: "My high sovereign... Your castle has been occupied by a stupid leafy golem and you're doing nothing but waiting in the old town? Why? Why we can't go back home? Answer me! Don't leave!"

property.name: onTalked
property.value: "Damn you, traveller."

property.name: onTalked
property.value: "You've to excuse me. I need some time."

property.name: onTalk
property.value: "Reelfo said that I've to stay put... but there might be something I can do! Sorry, traveller. I have an errand to run. Farewell."

property.name: onTalk
property.value: "That... that elven girl was in such a hurry... Brother Salivello is gone missing again. He went to the west side of the castle but isn't back. After I've explained that to her, she ran away all of the sudden..."

property.name: onTalked
property.value: "Oh, my. What... What can I do now?"

property.name: npcName
property.value: "Elven guard"

property.name: onTalk
property.value: "Welcome traveller. Our sovereign was waiting for you. Please, come in."

property.name: onTalked
property.value: "I'm honored to serve our sovereign... but I wonder why we're not trying to get back the castle..."

property.name: onClosed
property.value: "There should be a switch somewhere..."

property.name: onClosed
property.value: "There should be a switch somewhere..."

property.name: onClosed
property.value: "There should be a switch somewhere..."

property.name: onClosed
property.value: "There should be a switch somewhere..."

property.name: onTalk
property.value: "Ah! Ah! You are way too slow, traveller. You have to do better than this if you want to stop me again!"

property.name: onTalk
property.value: "I... I was looking for Brother Salivello but, after running from skeletons, I fell exhausted here. I waited for help but a young elven came and just ran away saying anything. Anyway, thank you. I'll cast a Blessed Circle for you."

property.name: onTalk
property.value: "Hey! I just don't care about that suicidal monk. I just want to climb the castle walls... and if you don't stop following me I swear that I'll put an arrow through your head!"

property.name: npcName
property.value: "Brother Salivello"

property.name: onTalk
property.value: "Ow. Hello again, adventurer. I've... just found this switch that opens the castle gates in order to take the precious... freedom, yes. Well. I'm going back to the town. Thank you!"

property.name: onSwitchLocked
property.value: "What Brother Salivello is doing here? I've to ask him."

property.name: onSwitchPressed
property.value: "Something is rumbling in front of the castle..."

property.name: onTalk
property.value: "That monk was helpful after all... I wonder why my father forgot to mention anything about this button... Now I've to sneak into the castle before he know it!"

property.name: onTalk
property.value: "Thank you for saving Brother Salivello again. He loves bringing the faith in the Gods to the people, so he often put himself in danger."

property.name: onTalk
property.value: "Castilla! Castilla! Don't... don't go there! You... Don't do that! Oh, Gods... Please, traveller! Bring her out of the castle! I'm begging you!"

property.name: onTalk
property.value: "Another door? Ack. There should be a switch on the Eastern Tower..."

property.name: onTalk
property.value: "So, traveller. Do you have decided to help me? Are you looking for the castle treasures? Or are you just curious about the castle golem? Anyway, we need to trigger the Western Tower switch in order to open this door... Please, help me."

property.name: onTalk
property.value: "The treasure is over there, traveller. You deserve it. I hear more monsters behind this door but I can defeat them by myself: I've to conquer the throne room alone and show my father that I'm not worthless. Thank you for your help."

property.name: onSwitchPressed
property.value: "Castilla: Aagh! What? What!!"

property.name: onTalk
property.value: "I am the guardian golem, the defender of the nature, the true meaning of life on this earth. Why? Why you want to fight justice?"

property.name: onTalk
property.value: "Th... That... golem... She... She looks like... Mom... What... What is happening? Why that golem has my mother face? Why dad? WHY?"

property.name: onDefeated
property.value: "I was... defending the life... and I've just found my death. I hope that someone will take my place, one day. But... That eyes. The eyes of that elven girl... I've seen them... The Guardian Stone... My beloved husband..."

property.name: onTalk
property.value: "I can't understand... why that golem had my mother face? Father said she should be in a safe place far away... he lied to me? I can't find him anywhere... Anyway, your quest is over, traveller. Thank you."

property.name: onTalked
property.value: "Have a nice trip, traveller. And thank you."

property.name: campaignEpilogue
property.value: "Another golem died by the blade of your sword. Is this ship going to bring you to them in order to slay em all? With this doubt in mind, you step into your ship and set sail."

property.name: onTalk
property.value: "Castilla... ugh... forgive... me..."

property.name: npcName
property.value: "Elven women"

property.name: onTalk
property.value: "I... I don't have any more reason for living... Please, let me die in this sweet and deadly meadow alone."

property.name: campaignName
property.value: "Stones and bones"

property.name: campaignPrologue
property.value: "You regain consciousness on a strangely familiar small lifeboat docked on the seaside. After contemplating the sky, you decide to stand up and exploring a bit."

property.name: shopProducts
property.value: [ "potion","melee","ranged","armor"]

property.name: onTalk
property.value: "Dwarf village."

property.name: onTalk
property.value: "Ugh. The dwarf village has been attacked by skeletons. I... I managed to escape and isolate the city using my Guards Seal... Take it. I don't... need... it anymore."

property.name: onClosed
property.value: "Looks like some kind of key is needed."

property.name: onOpened
property.value: "You used the Guards Seal."

property.name: onClosed
property.value: "Looks like some kind of key is needed."

property.name: onOpened
property.value: "You used the Guards Seal."

property.name: onTalk
property.value: "You! Are you coming from the outside? So that damn door has been opened! That gutless guard closed us into this cave with the monsters. Now we've to found the others!"

property.name: npcName
property.value: "Brother Salvatore"

property.name: onTalk
property.value: "Please, wayfarer. You have to save Brother Salivello... he is exploring the west side of the caves looking for an exit. All I can offer you is this Belssed Circle for your rest."

property.name: onTalk
property.value: "Guards my ass. They trapped us here!"

property.name: npcName
property.value: "Brother Salivello"

property.name: onTalk
property.value: "Ow. Hello, adventurer. I'm Brother Salivello and I was... I was looking for an exit, yes. I've finally found this chest... for you. Take it as your reward. I'm going back to the village. Thanks..."

property.name: npcName
property.value: "Brother Salvatore"

property.name: onTalk
property.value: "Brother Salivello is back to the church safe and sound. Thank you wayfarer! Now I hope that the Travellers Guild chief is safe too..."

property.name: onTalk
property.value: "The guards ran away..."

property.name: onTalk
property.value: "I've searched the Traveller Guild chief on the south-east of the caves but I failed. All I've found is this key - take it! Please, help me!"

property.name: onOpened
property.value: "You used the traveller key."

property.name: onOpened
property.value: "You used the traveller key."

property.name: onOpened
property.value: "You used the traveller key."

property.name: onTalk
property.value: "Oh, GREAT! Damn. Someone sent you to bring me back? Okay, I'm going back. But I'll kill that damn dwarf one day!"

property.name: onTalk
property.value: "Wendy is so furious... the dwarf village governor stolen some weapons from her goods and ran into the cave. He must hiding somewhere."

property.name: onTalk
property.value: "I hope Wernogow is alive. I've stocked some food in our hidden shelters... but I hope he won't need them."

property.name: onTalk
property.value: "You came for me, yes? I was looking for a way out for my people but skeletons attacked me. You look strong - We've to talk. Let's meet at our village."

property.name: onTalk
property.value: "We gave the dwarf Guardian Stone to our strongest warrior... but he turned into a rock golem and started attacking. Then the golem went to the North East Maze. I've opened the door for you. Have a look there. Good luck!"

property.name: onTalked
property.value: "You can save us all!"

property.name: onTalk
property.value: "Ugh... I just... managed to close the west side of the caves... Please... keep that area sealed. Don't give my Guards Seal to anyone..."

property.name: onOpened
property.value: "You used the Guards Seal."

property.name: onTalk
property.value: "I am the guardian golem, the defender of the skeletons, the people that lived these lands way before the living. Why? Why you want to fight justice?"

property.name: onDefeated
property.value: "Why... Why I've been entrusted with the Guardian Stone and then betrayed like this? But my people will live on... and take back what was theirs."

property.name: onTalk
property.value: "You saved our village and my people! Do you want to be our new guardian? Ah! Ah! Ah! I shouldn't ask travellers to stay. Here. This is a little reward for your mission. Good luck on your journey!"

property.name: onTalk
property.value: "Are you going to leave with your boat? I'll leave the dwarf village soon too. Thank you for saving our boss!"

property.name: onTalk
property.value: "We've prepared your boat on the south beach. Thank you for helping these people... and for saving our Brother Salivello."

property.name: campaignEpilogue
property.value: "This adventure made you stronger and valorous. Is this the beginning of a new life? With this ambitius thought in mind, you retract the moorings and leave."

property.name: onTalk
property.value: "Rierogher stolen our Guardian Stone, saying that, as the strongest dwarf warrior, he deserved it. I had to stop him at any cost: now his body lies buried in these caves."

property.name: onTalk
property.value: "Wernogow usually takes note of everything important on his journal. I wonder why he isn't doing that right now."
